TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement/Page extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Contains classes that provide objects for the parts of a page. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Page> class provides a foundation in which the following classes are defined:
- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Page.Down>
- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Page.DownHorizontal>
- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Page.Up>
- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Page.UpHorizontal>
Each of these classes provides one or more properties that return a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> for the part of the page specified by the class name.
